name: Add new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new GetForm submission
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in Getform, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. 
 
The template expects your form to have the following fields:
1. Name
2. Email
3. Message

More information on how to create this sample form [here.](
https://getform.io/installations/basic-installation)
